title: Replacing Coffee With Green Tea Affects Your Body In These 6 Ways, Experts Say
author: JR Thorpe
description: Coffee is one of America's favorite beverages — a survey published in 2018 found that 64% of the nation drinks at least one cup every day — and a hot steaming espresso in the morning can be one of life's greatest joys. However, coffee isn't your...
